Dining Menu

Dining Menu

Welcome to

The Backbeach Eating House

There's Only One Place Like The Backbeack Cafe & Restaurent,located on Bunbury's Backbeach With uninterrupted views of crisp White sand and the Indian Ocean. The Perfect Place to eat, ralax and enjoy

We are proud to support local basiness and local producers by courcing as much as possible locally,including fish from Augusta, beet and chicken from Wwestern Austrailia (DBC) Coffee from Yollingup and Wines from Feguson Valley, Margaret River and throghout the South West.

More

Happy Customers
